Lower the call to &#39;memset&#39; intrinsic function into a series of store operations.

<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="DAG">Selection DAG where lowered code is placed.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="dl">Link to corresponding IR location.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="Chain">Control flow dependency.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="Dst">Pointer to destination memory location.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="Src"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> of byte to write into the memory.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="Size">Number of bytes to write.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="Alignment">Alignment of the destination in bytes.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="isVol">True if destination is volatile.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="AlwaysInline">Makes sure no function call is generated.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="DstPtrInfo">IR information on the memory pointer.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

<SectionUser title="Returns">
New head in the control flow, if lowering was successful, empty <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> otherwise.
</SectionUser>

The function tries to replace &#39;llvm.memset&#39; intrinsic with several store operations and value calculation code. This is usually profitable for small memory size or when the semantic requires inlining.

<Link id="l11035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11035"><Highlight kind="comment">/// MorphNodeTo - This &#42;mutates&#42; the specified node to have the specified</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l11036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11036"><Highlight kind="comment">/// return type, opcode, and operands.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l11037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11037"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l11038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11038"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Note that MorphNodeTo returns the resultant node.  If there is already a</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l11039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11039"><Highlight kind="comment">/// node of the specified opcode and operands, it returns that node instead of</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l11040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11040"><Highlight kind="comment">/// the current one.  Note that the SDLoc need not be the same.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l11041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11041"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l11042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11042"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Using MorphNodeTo is faster than creating a new node and swapping it in</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l11043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11043"><Highlight kind="comment">/// with ReplaceAllUsesWith both because it often avoids allocating a new</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l11044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11044"><Highlight kind="comment">/// node, and because it doesn&#39;t require CSE recalculation for any of</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l11045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11045"><Highlight kind="comment">/// the node&#39;s users.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l11046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11046"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l11047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11047"><Highlight kind="comment">/// However, note that MorphNodeTo recursively deletes dead nodes from the DAG.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l11048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11048"><Highlight kind="comment">/// As a consequence it isn&#39;t appropriate to use from within the DAG combiner or</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l11049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11049"><Highlight kind="comment">/// the legalizer which maintain worklists that would need to be updated when</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l11050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11050"><Highlight kind="comment">/// deleting things.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l11051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11051" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag/#a5877bd47049087f890aed4f0f501ec3f"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode">SDNode</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondag/#a5877bd47049087f890aed4f0f501ec3f">SelectionDAG::MorphNodeTo</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode">SDNode</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Opc,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l11052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11052"><Highlight kind="normal">                                  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/sdvtlist">SDVTList</a> VTs, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;SDValue&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/demangle/itaniumdemangle-h/#a926d7ce2143863b7a2afda0fca4d2b65">Ops</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l12547" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12547"><Highlight kind="comment">/// reachesChainWithoutSideEffects - Return true if this operand (which must</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l12548" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12548"><Highlight kind="comment">/// be a chain) reaches the specified operand without crossing any</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l12549" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12549"><Highlight kind="comment">/// side-effecting instructions on any chain path.  In practice, this looks</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l12550" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12550"><Highlight kind="comment">/// through token factors and non-volatile loads.  In order to remain efficient,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l12551" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12551"><Highlight kind="comment">/// this only looks a couple of nodes in, it does not do an exhaustive search.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l12552" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12552"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l12553" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12553"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Note that we only need to examine chains when we&#39;re searching for</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l12554" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12554"><Highlight kind="comment">/// side-effects; SelectionDAG requires that all side-effects are represented</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l12555" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12555"><Highlight kind="comment">/// by chains, even if another operand would force a specific ordering. This</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l12556" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12556"><Highlight kind="comment">/// constraint is necessary to allow transformations like splitting loads.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l12557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12557" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#a4da386b5ac53d58071c3d7d4b0d7dbbb"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#a4da386b5ac53d58071c3d7d4b0d7dbbb">SDValue::reachesChainWithoutSideEffects</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#a3c168b98c19bec1a872eaa955907693b">SDValue</a> Dest,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l12558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12558"><Highlight kind="normal">                                             </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1eb5609345b906d024fbf9e4bc1adc06afe578efb7ca235af77fb0eef7edcf639">Depth</a>)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l12559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12559"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (&#42;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">this</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> == Dest) </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l12560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12560"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l12561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12561"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Don&#39;t search too deeply, we just want to be able to see through</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l12562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12562"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// TokenFactor&#39;s etc.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l12563" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12563"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1eb5609345b906d024fbf9e4bc1adc06afe578efb7ca235af77fb0eef7edcf639">Depth</a> == 0) </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l12564" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12564"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l12565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12565"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If this is a token factor, all inputs to the TF happen in parallel.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l12566" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12566"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#ae779a9d142e6318d8fb0e4f0da32af0f">getOpcode</a>() == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110ad469508535ce2082a1ab1f0e429187b8">ISD::TokenFactor</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l12567" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12567"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// First, try a shallow search.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l12568" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12568"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#acd1cd968cb420c82d70926920fcdc7d7">is&#95;contained</a>((&#42;this)-&gt;ops(), Dest)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l12569" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12569"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We found the chain we want as an operand of this TokenFactor.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l12570" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12570"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Essentially, we reach the chain without side-effects if we could</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l12571" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12571"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// serialize the TokenFactor into a simple chain of operations with</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l12572" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12572"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Dest as the last operation. This is automatically true if the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l12573" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12573"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// chain has one use: there are no other ordering constraints.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l12574" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12574"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the chain has more than one use, we give up: some other</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l12575" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12575"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// use of Dest might force a side-effect between Dest and the current</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l12576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12576"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// node.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l12577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12577"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Dest.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#a342c0d4e8e59b30daefe9a05bc2098bd">hasOneUse</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l12578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12578"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l12579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12579"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l12580" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12580"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Next, try a deep search: check whether every operand of the TokenFactor</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l12581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12581"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// reaches Dest.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l12582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12582"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0d10fe510ced2849a8074fe81e5d04ce">llvm::all&#95;of</a>((&#42;this)-&gt;ops(), &#91;=&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#a3c168b98c19bec1a872eaa955907693b">SDValue</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l12583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12583"><Highlight kind="normal">      return Op.reachesChainWithoutSideEffects(Dest, Depth - 1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l12584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12584"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l12585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12585"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l12586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12586"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l12587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12587"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Loads don&#39;t have side effects, look through them.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l12588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12588"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loadsdnode">LoadSDNode</a> &#42;Ld = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;LoadSDNode&gt;</a>(&#42;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">this</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l12589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12589"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Ld-&gt;isUnordered())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l12590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12590"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Ld-&gt;getChain().reachesChainWithoutSideEffects(Dest, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1eb5609345b906d024fbf9e4bc1adc06afe578efb7ca235af77fb0eef7edcf639">Depth</a>-1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l12591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12591"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l12592" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12592"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l12593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12593"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l12594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12594"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l12595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12595" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode/#ab250276b651715d29b3ed20467d5f0a0"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode/#ab250276b651715d29b3ed20467d5f0a0">SDNode::hasPredecessor</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode/#af64f53af99d4ee7bbf57ea0aab719254">SDNode</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
